placementType.title: Placement Type
placementType.description: Budget Type indicates how the allocated budget will be spent

placementEndTime.title: Campaign Placement End Date and Time

adIds.title: Ad Identifiers
adIds.description: List of identifiers for the ads which are linked to this campaign placement.
